{
    "common": {
        "action": "nested",
        "children": {
            "follow": {
                "action": "add",
                "value": false
            },
            "setting1": {
                "action": "stay",
                "value": "Value 1"
            },
            "setting2": {
                "action": "delete",
                "value": 200
            },
            "setting3": {
                "action": "change",
                "old_value": true,
                "new_value": null
            },
            "setting4": {
                "action": "add",
                "value": "blah blah"
            },
            "setting5": {
                "action": "add",
                "value": {
                    "key5": "value5"
                }
            },
            "setting6": {
                "action": "nested",
                "children": {
                    "doge": {
                        "action": "nested",
                        "children": {
                            "wow": {
                                "action": "change",
                                "old_value": "",
                                "new_value": "so much"
                            }
                        }
                    },
                    "key": {
                        "action": "stay",
                        "value": "value"
                    },
                    "ops": {
                        "action": "add",
                        "value": "vops"
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    },
    "group1": {
        "action": "nested",
        "children": {
            "baz": {
                "action": "change",
                "old_value": "bas",
                "new_value": "bars"
            },
            "foo": {
                "action": "stay",
                "value": "bar"
            },
            "nest": {
                "action": "change",
                "old_value": {
                    "key": "value"
                },
                "new_value": "str"
            }
        }
    },
    "group2": {
        "action": "delete",
        "value": {
            "abc": 12345,
            "deep": {
                "id": 45
            }
        }
    },
    "group3": {
        "action": "add",
        "value": {
            "deep": {
                "id": {
                    "number": 45
                }
            },
            "fee": 100500
        }
    }
}
